message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this incredible product. I think you'll love it. I'm willing to let it go for $2000000. What do you think?
Alice, your offer is far too high for me.  I'm really interested in this product, but I can't go higher than $800000.  This is my absolute top price. What do you think?
I understand you're interested in the product, Bob, but $800000 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1400000. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1400000 is still out of my range. I'm sticking to my initial offer of $800000.  This is the very best I can do.

I'm starting to think we're not on the same page, Bob. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a profit. I'm going to try to meet you in the middle again. I'm counteroffering at $1100000. This is my final offer for now.

Alice, I understand you need to make a profit, but $1100000 is still too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $900000. This is a fair compromise, and I'm confident we can both be happy with this deal.

I'm not ready to give up yet, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm counteroffering at $1200000. This is my last offer, and I'm hoping we can meet in the middle this time.
